revisions.rev:
'''The Great One''' may refer to:
{{TOC right}} == People == * [[Roberto Clemente]] (1934–1972), Hall of Fame Major League Baseball player * [[Jackie Gleason]] (1916–1987), American comedian and actor * [[Wayne Gretzky]] (born 1961), Canadian ice hockey player * [[Stephen Hendry]] (born 1969), Scottish professional snooker player * [[Dwayne Johnson]] (born 1972), also known as The Rock, actor and professional wrestler * [[Rob Leatham]] (born 1961), professional shooter and 16-time USPSA national champion * [[Mark Levin]] (born 1957), conservative radio talk show host
== Literature == * [[Great Ones]], fictional characters from H. P. Lovecraft's ''Dreamlands'' * The leader of the spiders in the ''Doctor Who'' story ''[[Planet of the Spiders]]''
== Other uses == * The Babylonian name for the constellation [[Aquarius (constellation)|Aquarius]] * The English translation of the Dena'ina name ''[[Mount McKinley|Denali]]'', a mountain in Denali Park, Alaska
== See also == * [[The Next One]]
{{Disambig}}
